title: Day1 Eve, As We Lay, NY Resolution, Hated Co-workers and more.
itunes:title: Day1 Eve, As We Lay, NY Resolution, Hated Co-workers and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Stop making fun of Junior's government name Steve. The code cracker is back. Shirley Murdock has a song that translates to a bad memory for Our Fearless Leader. We bring you what you said you will do VS what you really gonna do? The Chief Love Officer has one question to answer about foulness. J. Anthony Brown talks about his dream. 11th hour positivity. Do you have certain types of people at the job that just rub you the wrong way? Today in Closing Remarks, Steve has something to say about not quitting.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
